title: Instructional Design Project Management Strategies Based on the ISD Model

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design concepts and project management experience
context.additional_context: Social sector competency enhancement program for working professionals.

learning_goals: The five-phase analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation process of the ISD model can be explained in connection with project management frameworks
Risk factors in instructional design projects can be identified and change management strategies can be established
Scope-schedule-budget management tools for developing mobile-friendly microlearning content can be utilized
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
